content: this is a very easy and relaxing shawl to make just garter stitch and a little bit of simple lace this color reminded me of falling leaves thus the name syyslalu means *autumn song* in finnish materials **yarn** madelinetosh merino light 100% merino ~ 100 g / 385 m two skeins color hot toddy shawl shown used 670 m of yarn **needles** 4 5 mm or to get gauge **notions** darning needle blocking materials gauge 17 sts and 44 row / 10 cm in garter stitch after blocking notes the size of the shawl is easily adjustable you can work both garter stitch part and/or lace part longer
